  • About me

Senzo Studio is a VFX agency that works for globally recognized production companies.

Introduction

The project consists of designing a website that allows Senzo Studio to gain visibility on the internet and strengthen their brand image.

Rol

Product designer

Date

September, 2022

Category

Web design

Timeline

4 weeks

Research

For the research, conducted an interview with two potential users. Below are the questions asked in the survey and an excerpt of the insights obtained.

Survey

After analyzing the type of user for Senzo Studio, I prepared the following document.

User survey

Thank you for participating in our survey! Your feedback is crucial to enhance our platform. Before we begin, please share a bit about yourself.

1.

Name:

2.

Age:

3.

Gender:

4.

Location:

5.

Ocupation:

6.

How do you anticipate using Senzo Studio's website in your professional workflow within the VFX industry?

7.

Can you describe specific tasks or activities for which you would rely on Senzo Studio's website to enhance your work?

8.

In your opinion, what are the key functionalities or features that a VFX studio's website should offer to cater to your needs effectively?

9.

What types of content or resources would you consider essential for a VFX studio's website to provide in order to be a valuable tool for professionals in the field?

10.

Considering your role and responsibilities in the VFX industry, what specific tools or functionalities do you believe should be easily accessible on the Senzo Studio website to streamline your tasks?

Thank you for taking the time to complete our survey! Your responses are invaluable in improving our services.

Insights

After asking the questions to the two users, I extracted the following information.

Mario González

24

VFX student

Madrid

"Finding job opportunities after completing studies"

Pedro Jiménez

42

True Lights CEO

Madrid

"Being able to showcase the work done for potential hiring"

User-story map

With the information extracted from the survey, I create the user story maps for both users.

Competitors

I conduct an analysis of the leading VFX studios in the market, creating a competitor analysis, a heuristic evaluation, and a content evaluation.

Validation

For the research, conducted an interview with two potential users. Below are the questions asked in the survey and an excerpt of the insights obtained.

Site map

With the clear content structure, I arrange the information architecture for the website. It would look like this:

Design system

To give consistency to the design and applying best practices, I developed a design system that would adapt to the project's needs.

Typography

Colors

The primary color is an intense shade of pink. I use the color to grab the user's attention, and it serves as the primary color for most of the components.

Primary

#FF0A44

Secondary

#C1C1C1

Components

To showcase part of the work done, I present the main navigation component, through which the user can navigate between different pages, perform advanced searches, and change the language.

Screen shots & Prototyping

After completing the final design, I prepared a version for desktop and another version for mobile devices.

Desktop prototype

View

Mobile prototype

View

Desktop version

The final design has a technological and futuristic style, in line with the type of service provided by Senzo Studio. It includes the functionalities requested by users and extracted from the survey, along with features typical of a website of this nature, as identified in the benchmark research.

Mobile version

I optimized the version for mobile devices. Here are some examples of the final result.

Learnings

This was my first project as a professional freelance. It was an excellent way to put into practice everything I was learning while simultaneously understanding the real needs of companies and users in the context of product design.
